data.name: Prof. Manindra Agrawal
data.title: Director, IIT Kanpur
data.shortdescribe: Renowned computer scientist, globally known for contributions in Complexity Theory and Cryptography
data.description: Prof. Manindra Agrawal is a renowned computer scientist and the Director of IIT Kanpur. Internationally recognized for co-developing the AKS primality test—the first deterministic, polynomial-time algorithm for primality testing—he has made foundational contributions to theoretical computer science.A faculty member at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Kanpur, Prof. Agrawal has also served as Deputy Director (2017–2021). His groundbreaking work has earned him numerous prestigious honors, including the Gödel Prize, Shanti Swarup Bhatnagar Award, Infosys Prize, and the Padma Shri.

data.name: Shri Amit A. Shukla
data.title: (Cyber Diplomacy, e-Governance & Information Technology) Ministry of External Affairs of India
data.shortdescribe: Leads India’s cyber diplomacy and e-governance initiatives, shaping the country’s global digital agenda
data.description: Mr. Amit A Shukla is a career diplomat of India. He has been working as Joint Secretary for Cyber Diplomacy and E-Governance in the Ministry of External Affairs of India since February 2024. Under this charge he is responsible for inter-governmental negotiations on the governance of Internet in bilateral and UN settings. He is also responsible for the administration of ICT assets of the Ministry of External Affairs of India.He has previously served at Indian Missions in Mauritius and Brazil. In the Ministry of External Affairs of India in New Delhi, he has worked on desks related to Bangladesh, Nepal and Bhutan for about eight years. In these neighbourhood-related assignments, he was associated with implementation of a range of India-assisted infrastructure and development cooperation initiatives. Coordination of assistance during Covid-19 pandemic and repatriation of stranded Indians/foreigners was also organized during this tenure.He has been associated extensively with implementation of India’s Neighbourhood First policy. His portfolios at the headquarters included trade, commerce, connectivity, development cooperation, border issues, settlement of India-Bangladesh land and maritime boundaries among others. In his assignments at Indian Missions, he has handled political desk, project implementation, trade & commerce desk, consular desk, protocol and administration matters, among others.

data.name: Dr. Gulshan Rai
data.title: Ex-NCSC Ex-DG CERT-In
data.shortdescribe: Key architect of India’s cybersecurity framework - country’s first National Cyber Security Coordinator at the Prime Minister’s Office
data.description: Dr. Gulshan Rai is a key architect of India’s cybersecurity framework, having served as the country’s first National Cyber Security Coordinator at the Prime Minister’s Office. Earlier, he led CERT-In as Director General, where he strengthened national cyber incident response capabilities. With decades of experience in cybersecurity, e-governance, and IT law, Dr. Rai played a pivotal role in shaping India's Information Technology Act and national cybersecurity policies. He is widely recognized for his strategic leadership, both in national policymaking and on international platforms.

data.name: Dr. Gaurav Gupta
data.title: Scientist F , MIETY , Govt of India
data.shortdescribe: Dr. Gaurav Gupta, India’s first doctorate in Digital Forensics, is a national leader in cyber security, law, and policy
data.description: Dr Gaurav Gupta is the first Indian to earn a doctorate in the field of digital forensics. He was bestowed with the Young Scientist Award of the Indian Science Congress in 2010 by the Man of Science, Dr A.P.J. Abdul Kalam. He has been a mentor and guide to many research students and interns and with rich experience of 24 years of experience. He is currently Scientist 'F'/Director with Cyber Security Group of Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology, Government of India. He is also the author of bestseller  book Cyber Unsafe available on amazon.

data.name: Col. Ashwini Bhardwaj
data.title: OSD, Ministry of External Affairs
data.shortdescribe: Over 25 years of experience in government service with specialization in ICT, cybersecurity, and public policy
data.description: Colonel Ashwini Bhardwaj, both a soldier and a scholar, is an alumnus of Indian Military Academy, Dehradun.  He was commissioned into the Corps of Signals during the peak of Kargil War in 1999.  He began his career under the blazing guns by supporting combat communications and undertaking electronic warfare operations during Operation Vijay and later as member of army’s elite counter-insurgency force in Kashmir Valley.Today, as Officer on Special Duty at the Ministry of External Affairs, he contributes by safeguarding India’s digital sovereignty by ensuring security of critical ICT infrastructure while shaping future-ready policies.His technical expertise extends beyond the battlefield. An IIT Kharagpur postgraduate in communications with advanced credentials in cybersecurity, AI/ML, electronic warfare and defense diplomacy, he has been involved in planning and engineering of strategic defence networks  and obsolescence-proof SATCOM architectures for our Armed Forces. When floods devastated Srinagar (Operation Meghrahat, 2014), as a unit commander along with his team, he was instrumental in restoring valley-to-rest of India communications within hours. In his illustrious career, Colonel Bhardwaj has represented India in multilateral defense-tech dialogues, managed ICT for Project Dantak in Bhutan, has been instructor at Military College of Engineering, Mhow, has commanded elite Signal Intelligence unit on western border, a strategic communication unit in Srinagar and a Director at Defence Intelligence Agency in MoD. With his vast experience, he also mentors young innovators committed towards national security in cyber-electromagnetic domain. His work and publications in the field of tactical spectrum management, EW in digitized battlefield and customised  cyber-defense tools reflects a mind dedicated to anticipating threats before they strike.

data.name: Lekshmi Nair
data.title: Global Capability Head, NTT Data
data.shortdescribe: Senior Cybersecurity leader with over 22 years of rich experience in Information Security Consulting and Cybersecurity Strategy
data.description: Lekshmi Nair is the Global Capability Head of Application and Offensive Security at NTT Data Inc., leading strategic capability development for clients worldwide. With 23+ years of experience in information security consulting and program management, she holds CISA, CISM, and ISO 27001 Lead Auditor certifications. Recognized as one of the Top 20 Women Influencers in Security in India and a CF100 Cyber Influencer Titan, Lekshmi specializes in cyber risk management, penetration testing, threat modeling, DevSecOps, and cloud security. She is also the Founding Member and President of WiCyS India and a strong voice for diversity and inclusion in cybersecurity. As a leadership coach, speaker, and mentor, she is passionate about empowering talent and bridging the cybersecurity skill gap.

data.name: Sadhna Singh
data.title: Policy Consultant at NITI Aayog | Strategic Affairs & Cybersecurity | Former Army Officer
data.shortdescribe: Former Indian Army Officer with over a decade of cross-sector experience in policy research, strategic affairs, cybersecurity.
data.description: Sadhna Singh is a Consultant at NITI Aayog, bringing over a decade of cross-sector experience in policy research, strategic affairs, cybersecurity, and stakeholder engagement. Her work focuses on driving impactful policy initiatives aligned with India's development goals, particularly in the domains of ICT, national security, and governance.A former officer in the Indian Army’s Corps of Signals, Sadhna brings mission-driven discipline and deep expertise in network administration and secure communications. Her combined military and policy experience enables her to navigate complex challenges with strategic foresight and deliver actionable, system-level solutions.She has been recognized with several prestigious honours, including Security Professional of the Year 2024, Business World Security 40 Under 40, and the Lady Leadership Award by CAPSI.Passionate about fostering collaboration, driving innovation, and contributing to inclusive and resilient national growth, Sadhna continues to champion initiatives that strengthen India’s strategic and cybersecurity posture.

data.name: Vijayant Gaur
data.title: Director General, CSAI | Former Head of Cyber Security Operations Center and Chief Advisor Cyber Security to UPPCL
data.shortdescribe: Over two decades of experience in cyber risk management, data protection, AI-ML, blockchain
data.description: Vijayant Gaur is a senior cybersecurity leader with extensive experience in managing cyber operations across critical government sectors. Currently serving as Director General at CSAI, he specializes in cybersecurity, AI, blockchain, digital payments, and quantum technologies. He has been the Former Head of Cyber Security Operations Center and Chief Advisor Cyber Security to UPPCL.

data.name: Mini Gupta
data.title: Partner – Cybersecurity, Data Privacy & GRC Technology, EY India
data.shortdescribe: Over 20 years of expertise in risk management, trusted advisor to clients across Technology, telecom, M&E and BFSI
data.description: With over 20 years of expertise in risk management, Mini Gupta is a trusted advisor to clients across TMT, Manufacturing, Media, and Financial Services. As a Technology Consulting Partner at EY India, she leads large-scale cyber transformations and provides strategic consulting in cybersecurity, data privacy, and technology risk. Mini is known for building high-impact delivery capabilities by leveraging intellectual property, global alliances, and Centres of Excellence. Her core strengths include cyber strategy, GRC implementation, data privacy services, IT risk management, and CISO advisory.

data.name: Abhishek Kakkar
data.title: Vice President, IAN Group
data.shortdescribe: Abhishek Kakkar is an early-stage venture investor with a strong blend of operational and investment experience.
data.description: Abhishek brings a distinctive combination of operator and investor perspectives to early-stage venture investing, drawing on hands-on experience in building the supply ecosystem at Magicpin and a track record of leading investments in Enterprise Tech, SMETech, and Analytics at Arka Venture Labs, as well as Consumer Internet at 91springboard.At IAN Group - which includes the IAN Angel Fund, BioAngels and IAN Alpha Fund, Abhishek focuses on identifying and partnering with founders who are building for scale across DeepTech, HealthTech, ClimateTech, Life Sciences, Enterprise Software, and Consumer Innovations, spanning seed to early growth stages.

data.name: Vibhore Sharma
data.title: Partner, CAPITAL 2B
data.shortdescribe: Vibhore Sharma is a seasoned deep-tech investor with over 18 years of experience in the internet and technology sector.
data.description: Vibhore Sharma is a seasoned deep-tech investor with over 18 years of experience in the internet and technology sector. As a creative technology leader turned venture investor, he focuses on identifying and nurturing science-backed innovations solving large-scale problems with long-term impact. Previously, he played a pivotal role in building and scaling the technology and product backbone at Info Edge, one of India’s earliest and most successful internet companies. At Capital2B and RedStart Labs, Vibhore actively partners with founders building transformative technologies for the future.

data.name: Ajay Modi
data.title: Director (Investment), Piper Serica
data.shortdescribe: Ajay Modi is an experienced investment professional leading both private and public market strategies at Piper Serica.
data.description: Ajay Modi is an experienced investment professional leading both private and public market strategies at Piper Serica. He played a pivotal role in raising a $30M early-stage VC fund and oversees the entire investment lifecycle—from deal sourcing and due diligence to closure and portfolio management. At Piper Serica, Ajay also drives the firm's public market investment strategies and plays a key role in steering the organization’s long-term growth. His hands-on approach and strategic insights make him a core pillar of the firm’s success.

data.name: Cdr Bheem Reddy
data.title: Vice President, Cybersecurity Operations
data.shortdescribe: Over 20 years in the Indian Navy with deep passion towards teaching and skill enhancement, specifically in cyber space
data.description: A veteran with 22+ years in the Indian Navy, Bheem Reddy brings a mission-driven approach to cybersecurity and digital transformation. He is passionate about building future-ready cyber professionals by focusing on skill development, leadership, and real-world preparedness. With a deep-rooted interest in defence technologies and mentoring, Bheem is committed to strengthening India's cybersecurity posture through entrepreneurship, training, and strategic thinking.

data.name: Amitava Mukherjee
data.title: Director – Cybersecurity, Siemens
data.shortdescribe: Over 30 years of experience in IT and cybersecurity governance, strategies, operations & audits
data.description: Amitava Mukherjee is a seasoned cybersecurity leader with over 30 years of experience in IT and cybersecurity governance. As Director of Cybersecurity at Siemens, he drives strategic initiatives in cyber risk management, operations, audits, and leadership engagement. Known for his cross-functional expertise, he is also a strong advocate of cybersecurity awareness, collaboration, and mentorship across industries.

data.name: Prof. Somitra Sanadhya
data.title: Professor,  IIT Kanpur
data.shortdescribe: Expert in Cryptology and Security, with key research focuses on Quantum Computation, Blockchains and cryptocurrencies
data.description: Prof. Somitra Sanadhya is a leading expert in cryptography and cybersecurity, currently teaching at IIT Kanpur. With over two decades of experience, his research spans post-quantum cryptography, blockchain security, and side-channel attacks. He previously served as Dean and CISO at IIT Jodhpur and has played key roles in major national cybersecurity initiatives.

data.name: Dr. Bharat Panchal
data.title: Cybersecurity Architect
data.shortdescribe: Known for architecting secure frameworks for UPI, RuPay, AEPS, FastTag, and national platforms like cybercrime.gov.in
data.description: A leading force in India’s cybersecurity and risk management landscape, known for architecting secure frameworks for UPI, RuPay, AEPS, FastTag, and national platforms like cybercrime.gov.in and the 1930 helpline. Played a pivotal role in shaping the country’s digital payment security while building high-performing risk teams at NPCI.Advises key government bodies including MEITY, CERT-IN, RBI, and IDRBT, and works closely with global networks like VISA, MasterCard, SWIFT, and World Bank. A globally recognized speaker, featured in 250+ Indian and 25+ international conferences across 40+ countries. Now driving the vision behind Bima Sugam, India’s unified digital insurance platform.

data.name: Venkatasubramanian Ramakrishnan
data.title: Head – Global Cyber Security Consulting, L&T Technology Services
data.shortdescribe: Over 20 years of experience in strategy, risk management, and technology solutions
data.description: Cybersecurity leader with 20+ years of experience in strategy, risk management, and technology solutions for global enterprises, defence, and government. Leads global cybersecurity business strategy at L&T Technology Services, with expertise in SOC, IoT & OT Security, Automotive Security, Product Security, Cyber Risk Management, and Cloud. A keynote speaker on AI/ML, cyber risk quantification, and industrial security, he has contributed to Global CISO Leadership Programmes, IIT Kanpur C3iHub mentorship, and the book Risk Assessment and Decision Analysis using Bayesian Networks.

data.name: Ranjeet Mishra
data.title: Strategy Leader
data.shortdescribe: 24 years expertise in cybersecurity, deep-tech startup ecosystem, business development, also cyber range instructor
data.description: Ranjeet Mishra is a seasoned technology and strategy leader with over 24 years of global experience across North America, APAC, and the Middle East. He specializes in go-to-market strategy, international business development, and scaling deep-tech startups in IT, telecom, and cybersecurity. With deep expertise in cybersecurity policy, governance, and risk frameworks, Ranjeet has worked extensively in areas such as IoT security, deception technologies, threat intelligence, and SoC management. He is also actively involved in cybercrime investigation frameworks, Cyberrange training, and startup incubation.A trusted advisor and technical mentor, Ranjeet is passionate about driving innovation, digital transformation, and building resilient cybersecurity ecosystems.
